text: Lindsay Ann Crouse (born May 12, 1948) is an American actress. For her role in Places in the Heart, she received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress. She was also in Slap Shot (1977), Between the Lines (1977), The Verdict (1982), Prefontaine (1997), and The Insider (1999). ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Lindsay Crouse
